people_also_ask.heading: It is considered to be one of the greatest video games of all time. On March 13, 2003, it was followed by Final Fantasy X-2, making it the first Final Fantasy game to have a direct game sequel....
people_also_ask.title: Final Fantasy X - Wikipedia

people_also_ask.heading: The HD remaster covers both Final Fantasy X and its sequel Final Fantasy X-2. ... All regional releases contain content from the International versions: X has the expert Sphere Grid and several optional bosses, while X-2 comes with extra dresspheres and new minigames.
people_also_ask.title: Final Fantasy X/X-2 HD Remaster - Wikipedia

people_also_ask.heading: The story of Final Fantasy X is one of the best stories ever told in the franchise, if not the entirety of gaming.
